Articles.Content:
My search-fu has come up with nothing, so hopefully I'm not wasting space.

I recently "lost" my avatar picture. Poof, gone! When I try to upload a new one (I've tried different formats and sizes) I'm presented with the "There was a problem processing the uploaded file. -200" error. Has anyone had this issue and found a solution? I feel naked—cold and naked.
What do you mean by "lost"? Was it deleted from your account somehow?
